website_summaries.verdict: A good basic sports water bottle that has an easy to carry handle and doesn't leak in your pack.
pros: Cap is attached to the bottle
Easy to clean with a wide mouth
Holds a lot of water, but is not too big
Wide mouth makes it easy to clean
cons: The click cap does not perform as well as it could and can be difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Chute this bottle is big.
customer_reviews.text: I love the high capacity, I'm able get the walk around to all my classes and not need a refill until the second half of my day. The condensation is a issue. The cap storage system isn't the best. The lid is made of a rubbery plastic, so although it feels nice, it get little frays of plastic here and there, it starts to look jagged. The big openings in the bottle make it really easy to clean. Also it doesn't fit in a conventional cup holder of any sort, car, backpack water bottle pocket, bike, etc. Be prepared to carry it or figure a creative way to not have to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: ThisIsJosh

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd be reviewing a water bottle
customer_reviews.text: but this thing is awesome! I use it at the office and two of these a day puts me fairly close to my needed water intake. The bottle feels nice in my hands and has a sturdy construction that would hold up well if dropped on hard floors or rocks while hiking. The bottle has REALLY good air flow which is important to me since I typically chug my water and the airflow accommodates that. The cap stows away in the the carrying hook so it stays out of my way and I don't have to continuously remove it. I really don't think I could ask for more in a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Handy, but kinda gross
customer_reviews.text: I'm a compulsive drinker. Er... compulsive water drinker. Having nearly a half gallon of water with me at all times has been fantastic. This bottle has served me well over the last year. However, it's absurdly difficult to clean. The worst part is the threading where the smaller cap screws onto the part you drink from. And I can't reach it with cleaning implements because the gunk is on the underside of the threading. No room to angle brushes or toothpicks or -anything-. I do like this bottle enough that I will be purchasing a replacement cap. Just be warned - these things get gross after a year even if you clean them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: sharilee

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle but it tends to leak
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bottle. The large size and built-in handle made it convenient to carry water around with me at work. Unfortunately, after about 7 months of use, the cap now leaks if I don't screw it really, really tightly (and even then, water will dribble out a little). I used to carry it around with me in my backpack but it ended up leaking all over my work laptop one night. I figured it was my own fault and resolved to tighten the cap more but today, it leaked again. I'll definitely keep it for home use, but I won't be carrying this around with me again.
customer_reviews.author: Tae K. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Can't do basic job of being water tight...
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst water bottle I've ever owned. Unless your want to check every time you close the lid to see if it's leaking or not, only to find out it's leaking. Do not buy it. Hate this thing spilling water all over my belongings only because it was a mm off from being completely sealed. Never had an issue with a nalgene, probably will go back to that brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hiren

customer_reviews.title: Great to carry your water in
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to stop buying bottled water as it's exceedingly wasteful! Tried the metal bottles but the water tastes funny after a while and the glass one are not practical to carry around. This however is just the right size to ensure I drink enough at work and convenient to lug around. I've experienced no spillage thus far. I contacted the seller as I saw a disclaimer on the product by they've reassured me that their materials are safe so hoping this doesn't have any ill effects on me.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to get more water in your life look no further! this water bottle holds so much water and yes it is quite big but it's a lot of water! I use this every day as my water bottle and love it. The one thing that I don't like is how easily it gets scratched or damaged. As long as you aren't dropping it around everywhere then you'll be fine! The top is pretty secure​ and I have had no troubles with leaking other than when i don't close the top tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Constantly leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an eddy camelbak before this, and would always keep my water bottle on my bed - because it's convenient having a lot of water available, and I don't have to worry about it spilling like I do with a glass of water - and I can just LEAVE it on my bed. Well with this new bottle I can't! Several times I have found my bed just drenched in water because of it leaking! I'm so disappointed with this product. The only reason I switched from an eddy to this was to prevent mold since I saw so many others complain, and guess what I actually found mold in this one!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra storage but not as your primary!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend! It is way too big / bulky for a smaller back pack. The smaller cap is not the easiest to get open and the big one keeps getting in the way while filling the bottle. I prefer my Rove tritan which is super easy to open with one hand and has a retainer to keep the smaller cap from plopping onto your face. This CamelBak is more useful as a 2nd bottle while traveling or when using a larger backpack where you can distribute / balance the load better.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: I bough two of these and they both leak like sieves. I would not recommend this product for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for my old camelbak water bottle. I bough two of these and they both leak like sieves. I would not recommend this product for purchase at any price than a dollar store price. Just tilt them too much on their side and it leaks. I didn't use these bottles immediately. I had them ready for when the older bottle lid fully cracked. Too late to return now. A waste of my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Romo

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, Great value
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bottle after my original CamelBak Eddy bottle started leaking. I unknowingly purchased the 1.5 liter bottle, but the large size made the bottle worth it. I am able to stay hydrated throughout the day without constantly refilling my water bottle. My original Eddy bottle cost $15 for 750 ml, but this 1500 ml bottle was only $12. I would definitely recommend this product because not only is it a wonderful water bottle, but it also is a great value. The spout is small enough to drink out of without any spills, which is definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I love it so much I lost mine and was so sad I had to order two more - two in case I lost it again I wouldn't have to go without ! By the way "lost" really should read left it at work where I found it after I ordered two more so now I have three but I am not even mad about it ! It really is leak proof! I actually like room temp water so this is perfect for me but I think if you put ice in it it would sweat---I haven't tried it but I am assuming it would.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, but wish it had better insulation
customer_reviews.text: Hey mommies, I bought this thing for the size, which I love. I tend to drink a lot of water every day, since I'm the undisputed water champ. However, the insulation isnt great since it's a single-layer polymer, so the water gets warm over an hour or two. The only other issue I have is that the mouthpiece can sometimes drip water when pulling it away from your mouth, making you look like youve never had a bowl of moose soup in your life... Otherwise, great product! -Jean
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very ergonomical to be so large!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle! It’s huge, so I don’t have to worry about filling it up multiple times a day, but it’s very ergonomic to be so large. It does take some practice to get the lid to lock in place, but once you get the hang of it, it’s a snap. This bottle also has a lifetime warranty, which is great because I’ve had a number of water bottles break on me over the years. This one seems really resilient, though. Overall, im quite happy with this purchase and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect water bottle if you're trying to stay hydrated and be better about drinking water. There are measurement lines along the outside of the bottle which allow you to measure your water intake. The bottle is decent quality, easy to clean, and doesn't leak. Also, it does have a place on the lid where it could be attached to something like a backpack with a sturdy clip.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie F

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, large capacity
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bottle for over a year now. It's fairly easy to clean and is portable. Be aware the 1.5L size will probably not fit in any cup holders you have. Leak proof, and has held up with extended use - only minor scratches at the bottom of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Curivity

customer_reviews.title: Love the product. No flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit bigger than I imagined it to be, but that's my problem, not CamelBak's. Anyway, first off, I love the design. The measurement markings are clearly labeled and easy to read. The cap is a slight twist off/on and can be lodged in the carrying hole behind it when you are drinking. The bottle itself seems very durable. Overall, love the product! It also encourages me to drink more water.
customer_reviews.author: Isles2729

customer_reviews.title: Love my CamelBak water bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love my CamelBak water bottles. I have everything from their smaller bottles up to the 1.5L. I also like the new style cap on this bottle because it allows you to pull a long drink of water without having to bite a valve or use a straw. I also like the 1.5L size. Although, it doesn't fit in any cup holders in the cars we drive. But, that is a minor inconvenience. Well constructed and useful design for the cap which nests inside the sturdy handle.
customer_reviews.author: Virbage

customer_reviews.title: Big, sturdy water bottle for big, sturdy thirsty people
customer_reviews.text: It's huge, but I like it. I'm a big guy and like the size, but this is close is way more than a quart of water. Sturdy and a unique top that you'll need to pay attention to when you first use it, so that you actually get the top on securely, but it works great. It's just different.
customer_reviews.author: David Bloom

customer_reviews.title: camelbak is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my second camelbak bottle. Have the 1L and realized i needed a bigger bottle for long days at work. This 1.5L is ideal for that purpose. I'd recommend that you ensure the outlet mouthpiece is securely tightened if bottle wont always be upright. Ive had a few instances where it seemed closed but leaked in my bag. so just ensure it is tightened and all shall be well :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: These bottles are SO nice. I really loved mine
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are SO nice. I really loved mine, but unfortunately I could not use them in the way I wanted (I like to freeze my water, so..) and ended up replacing them with stainless steel bottles. Nonetheless, the large size makes it very easy to make daily water drinking quota. The coating on the caps began to peel after a while and aesthetically it looks a bit ugly, but these bottles are very nice and last for a long time. Cleaning can be a bitch too, so just use one of those scrub brushes and soak well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, sturdy construction.  Well thought out design.
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping or the gym (if you're the type who brings huge jugs to the gym). Construction is solid and the drinking spout is nice. The open/close cap is easy to use. Just a half turn opens or closes it. The cap is also attached to the to the body so very little chance of losing it unless you're ripping it off forcefully. Hopefully this review helps someone!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love CamelBak
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with a CamelBak. I decided to get this instead of the straw bottle because I had a straw one and just kept getting weird smells out of it after one use. Then there was mold that started to collect in the mouth piece that is almost impossible to reach. I have had no issues with this water bottle and even though it is HUGE it is great to have at work. Really helps me drink 1500ml a day at work (9-5 job) and keeps me hydrated :)
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: worked great for keeping track of water intake while pregnant
customer_reviews.text: worked great for keeping track of water intake while pregnant. I tend to have to switch between bottles for something new every few months. So the open mouth worked great for a while. But now I have switched back to the straw. Starting to not want that so I am glad I have this to go back to. Nice that I don't have to remember to fill 3 times in a day Just once and drink through it . then I would have my glass at dinner and know I got enough fluid in for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Best water bottle ever. I have to drink 1 gallon a day (2.5 of these) for health reasons. The size and mouth hole design makes it so much easier for me to drink enough. Less trips to fill up and less times trying to remember how many bottle fulls i drank. Mouthpiece is large so I can chug easier. there are some complaints about snapping the cap, as someone suggested get one side in then snap the other instead of trying to snap both sides at once. (makes more sense if you own the bottle)
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B G

customer_reviews.title: the water is turning grey inside my grey bottle
customer_reviews.text: after only 3 months of use the water inside is turning grey from the grey bottle, so I contact the manufacturer for its lifetime warranty claim and they ask me to ship the bottle back to them using my own money plus insurance cost according to the warranty policy on their website. so why the four and five stars reviews? maybe fake reviews?
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: These leak easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband as he works outdoors. At first he liked them a lot, especially the large size. However, twice within a month or so they have leaked and spilled all over his bag. It seemed that just a slight bump is enough to open the cap and mske it spill.
customer_reviews.author: Rsh

customer_reviews.title: Hydrate or Die
customer_reviews.text: Camelbak never disappoints. It does take some maneuvering to get the cap to fit into the handle, hope that breaks in. Love the size and spout. Got this so I can have more of my drinking water from home vs the terrible water at work.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Norton

customer_reviews.title: Helps you drink more water
customer_reviews.text: My husband is trying to drink 3 liters of water daily and this bottle makes it easier for him to meet his water intake goal. No more forgetting to drink water throughout the day. Having this handy bottle nearby lets you keep track of how much water you've drank and reminds you to drink more lest you forget. The bottle is sturdy, leak proof, and easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this bottle to others.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer Top Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: I NEED MORE
customer_reviews.text: I full this up 2 to 3 times daily -- I need more! This size is everything to help you stay hydrated. New model is great too but this one is cheaper and it's an oldie but a goodie! Bought one for my Boyfriend as well and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Cox

customer_reviews.title: awesome bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend who was in need of a new water bottle. I have the smaller, purple version of the bottle and he liked my bottle but wanted one with a larger capacity since he is constantly drinking water. He likes the top a lot because it isn't a wide open mouth to sip from plus he can open it entirely to fill it up with water with ease. He's happy with it and it makes me happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I live in a desert and water is a necessity to carry with us daily. I have this in black, and the blue one I bought for my nephew. We both love it. I don't recommend dropping it yet rest assure if you do, it won't shatter or break. I also like the mouth piece being covered unlike other water bottles CamelBak carry. Helps with decrease in germs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different Product Sent
customer_reviews.text: My Camelbak has the beginning so f a crack so I ordered another one. The one I received did not have the gradations I use and the cap used a magnet to stow the lid. This is definitely not the same item pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jitters

customer_reviews.title: It leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a CamelBak because I expected it to be a quality product that wouldn't leak. I use this for work since we don't have access to water fountains. The 1.5 Liter size is too big for cup holders in cars, so it has to ride in the passenger seat or the floor of my car. I've had it fall over on my commute a couple times and leak significantly, even though I've appropriately closed it. Other than that it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kiley

customer_reviews.title: I love that these bottles aren’t those big
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bottles aren’t those big, bulky jugs that look like cooler jugs. I can take a swig with one hand instead of feeling like a small child lol. I haven’t had any issues with leaking, and they are quite durable. I really like that the cap locks in nicely and out of the way. I bought a second one for myself and one for my boyfriend, so I am certainly a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mermini

customer_reviews.title: Got it for a little over 5 bucks. A ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a little over 5 bucks. A steal. This bottle is rock solid and holds a lot of water. It is a little difficult to snap the unscrewed cap into the holder but that is not really necessary to drink from it.
customer_reviews.author: D in MN

customer_reviews.title: Very good bottle
customer_reviews.text: Super durable plastic and the handle is very sturdy. You will never loose or drop the cap, just make sure you actually screw it on or you spill the water! Holds a lot of water. Easy to clean because you can put it in the dishwasher. A+
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Michael Caro

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I lurrrrve this water bottle. I carry it everwhere with me. The top and the spout cover screw on tightly, and it does not leak. You you can slip a couple of fingers through the grip and carry the bottle very easily with one hand. I’ve dropped it more than a few times, and it seems pretty indestructible. I have never been a “water bottle person” before now, but I am absolutely a convert now that I have this bottle. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: BookerP

customer_reviews.title: This Thing is ENORMOUS
customer_reviews.text: It's huge and I love it. I freeze it half full overnight (with the lid off) and fill it the rest of the way in the mornings, and I have a cold drink all day. It doesn't leak, and the storage lock for the cap is nice, but maybe a bit of a pain to make work. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Durable, leak proof, high quantity water on the go
customer_reviews.text: The pour is great, and it's never leaked. Two complaints are it sweats like a mofo in heat with cold contents, and to no real fault of its own due to size, isn't friendly with most holders for such items like bike water holders.
customer_reviews.author: JMeiman

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle to infuse my water with all ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle to infuse my water with all kinds of fruits. I specifically bought a big enough size (1 liter) to fit fruit, ice and water. I liked the drinking spout on this because it is big enough to get a good sip but small enough to keep the fruit from going in your mouth. I am used to drinking water out of an insulated water bottle and I like my water ice cold. Unfortunately because this one isn't insulated the ice melted very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh213

customer_reviews.title: I have had other large water bottles but it is very difficult to find good, sturdy water bottles that are 1
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy 1.5 liter water bottles (disposable) because they were the easiest to keep track of how much I drank each day. I have had other large water bottles but it is very difficult to find good, sturdy water bottles that are 1.5 liters and not 1 L or 1/2 gallon. This is easy to fill, hold, and isn't too heavy once its filled because of how its built and well balanced. I would highly recommend this for someone who is looking for a water bottle this size.
customer_reviews.author: Maries

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The reason I give this product 2 stars is because after 2 wks of using it daily, the cap has come loose and water drips out. When I got it, I loved the color and the capacity. This product would be perfect if only it wouldn't have started dripping. And 2 wks is too fast for something to break down like that. I thought I'd have more time before experiencing something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great large bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bottle, hope to have many enjoyable days. Didn't want to carry a camelback on my back for 400 miles. I'm strapping this to top bar with two Velcro strips, bought and drilled hole in cork to leave top open. I'm using fish tank airline into bottle, other end will clip or rubber band shut while cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Skymollie

customer_reviews.title: great bottle
customer_reviews.text: daughter loves it and was totally bummed when someone swiped it when she left it at school. She went back to where she left it and couldn't find it. She has since been using her Mom's bottle and we may just have to get her a new one. She loves the quality and the size, but we may try one with a straw.
customer_reviews.author: CO-Joe

customer_reviews.title: This is a BIG bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Construction is solid but I didn't realize how big the bottle is until I had it in my hand - actually need two hands to hold it. I wish they made the contour of the bottle more user-friendly to those without huge hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Jin

customer_reviews.title: 40+ oz size is great!  Love the blue color.  clean and neat on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to last all morning! I have several of the smaller bottles, but this one is large enough to fill with ice from the dispenser at work and lasts all morning. I always ran out of water with the smaller bottle! Even though the bottle sweats (need napkin or coaster) it is very very useful size.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelry Lover

customer_reviews.title: A+ Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The best water bottle for campus/hiking life. I usually have brief moments before my next class and never have the chance to get water on the way. This is great for hiking too! I can't tell you how many times I've banged this bottle on rocks and tubed the river grinding it on the river gravel. It holds up and secures water from dirt or outside water going in. Great buy and will buy again if I manage to break/lose this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Such a great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It doesn’t leak, it is very durable, it holds tons of water, it is easy to drink out of and yet easy to fill. The one precaution is that if it’s in a bag that’s full or has pressure, it is possible for the lid to become unscrewed, which can be very messy
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: ) Good for cold brewing ice tea in the cooler
customer_reviews.text: These things are more large than I expected, although I read the volume they contain. :) Good for cold brewing ice tea in the cooler. My son took one right away. I love that the chute lids fit all my other camelbak bottles. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love them but I lose the things so much it drives me insane I need one with my name and phone number on it. Great quality though fast shipping and overall good product. I prefer the nozzled bottles but that’s just me these are great for workouts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J

customer_reviews.title: This thing is huge, the biggest concern with reading ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge, the biggest concern with reading other reviewers is leakage. Haven't had this leak on me yet. I'm also avoiding using it for anything other than water and handwashing when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Also hold lots of water so great for long hikes
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a 8 day white water trip -- could use it on the river when bouncing around, stayed sealed. Stayed clipped on in heavy water as it was bounced around a lot. Also hold lots of water so great for long hikes, rides in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: CheapWatch Collector

customer_reviews.title: My friends and family are tired of me talking about this wonderful water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bottle. It fits perfectly in the holder in the door of my mk7 GTI and I love the way the cap snaps into the lid when it's open to keep it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Elliott

customer_reviews.title: camelbak is awesome. I usually like the ones with the straws
customer_reviews.text: As always, camelbak is awesome. I usually like the ones with the straws, but they didn't have a 1.5L with the straw. This is still awesome, seals well, has leaked once, but it was because I didn't screw the cap on properly so be careful of that. Holds up great in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT, Storage Cap, Spill Proof, Large size
customer_reviews.text: BIG, clean, the storage area for the cap is SOOO helpful! LOVE THIS 1.5 liter bottle and drink 2 a day if possible. NO leaks at all. I do wish it narrowed to fit into a car cupholder - but alas, it wouldn't be as sturdy then, it's so leakproof though, and easy to close and open that it doesn't matter! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: DebsD

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle with a minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Helps me drink enough water. Large size, great spout. I took a point off because it is relatively easy to not get a good seal on the drinking spout and dribble water everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Landrex Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Great, gigantic water bottle
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I thought it would be. But us a great water bottle. Doesn't fit any cupholders though because of how big it is. But easy to clean and nice functionality
customer_reviews.author: APRIL

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: Best water bottle ever! I bought one for my kid and I bought one just for my car. And I have one that I carry around inside the house I just love it. The angle of the shoot makes it so easy to drink water you end up drinking way more water without even realizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people keep saying that their leaks could just be a case by case thing, but mine definitely doesn't leak and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It leaks...
customer_reviews.text: It leaks sometimes. The cap holder is tight and is awkward to get the cap in. Overall, just not a super functional bottle especially because it LEAKS. So annoying. Made all the contents of my gym bag wet.
customer_reviews.author: Rf

customer_reviews.title: these are great, but they sweat condensation like crazy - so ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great, but they sweat condensation like crazy - so don't expect anything to stay cold for more than a couple hours. I would not pick this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Tested Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great size and removable parts
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, and how easy it is to clean. It was a little hard to get familiar with how to push the cap into place so it’s out of the way, but now I don’t even think about it. It’s was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: noel marco

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of disposable plastic bottles!
customer_reviews.text: I drink several 1.5 litres of water a day and wanted to stop using Smart Water plastic disposable water bottles because of the cost and the environment. I would refill every night and use for a week or two (I know, that's gross--it's why I bought 3 of these and can quickly wash). If you are used to Smart water 1.5 litre size then this will work for you. Quick wash in the evening and refill, put in fridge overnight and ready to go! Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: Because this is one of the best water bottles you can get for under 20 bucks ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog puked on my friends water bottle so I bought him one of these. Because this is one of the best water bottles you can get for under 20 bucks and when your dog pukes on someone elses stuff you don't settle for less.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought this bottle because my other bottle was making weird noises every time I would drink out of it. I love the bottle for how much it can hold and the aesthetic of it. Great water bottle too to track your water intake!!
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Huge!  Perfect for the longest workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I had to upsize to this big guy for certain of my toughest workouts! I like this style of spout...no straws to clean. I throw this with the lid and cap open on the dishwasher and it comes out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi NJ

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Little tricky getting the cap into the 'slot' but it's doable. I like the larger spout and larger capacity, makes it super easy to 'get your water' for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Hod Fam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love it was worried the 1.5 was bigger than I wanted but glad I got it. I fill this up about half with water and out in freezer. Then add water to it and it stays cold a long time. As the ice melts it still stays cold for several hours even in the summer heat. Love the removable cap with wide mouth I am now completely sold on camelBak products
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Humes

customer_reviews.title: My New Constant Companion
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill with beverages and ice. Non-spill. Durable. No funky plastic taste or smell. One minor issue- the plug tether is not quite long enough so it is awkward to hold the plug and drink. Still like this. Researched a lot and chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: H.M.

customer_reviews.title: After 6 weeks, it is unuseable due to a ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 weeks, it is unuseable due to a strange taste and odor. I have used it for water. Nothing else. It's hard to clean and the funk just won't go away. It's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this water bottle; it's all the water I need for a day! It doesn't have the funky smell that my Nalgene bottle kept getting and it's a beautiful color--the picture really doesn't do it justice! This is dorky, but I lift it like a weight at my desk and it really works out my arms, too, hahaha! The only reason I gave it four stars is the top peels (see pictures). If they fixed that, it would be PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: leiluni

customer_reviews.title: Drink naturally, don't squeeze and suck
customer_reviews.text: Wide mouth is the way to go when you're thirsty, and with the convenience of locking the cap into the handle. This bottle is easy to carry on a finger while you're juggling all of your junk. Fits nicely into your hand. I've purchased several of these for the gym, the office, the bedroom, and several extras since the rest of the family keeps taking mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Steitz

customer_reviews.title: 5-STAR water bottle! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Keep it on my nightstand and it works great! Great quality and can be washed in the dishwasher. I love how big it is. Only downside is that it doesn't fit in my car cupholders, but I still give it a 5-star because of how much I love it and because I don't use it for car use.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Health hazard product
customer_reviews.text: After using this bottle I noticed some kind of grey dust inside. I can't figure out where is it coming from. I assume it's the paint. As bottle color is also grey. Taste is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is HUGE! It was bigger than I expected but I love it. I can finish my daily water intake without going back and forth to the sink or fountain a thousand times a day. The only downside is it doesn't fit in a cup holder but I have a purse sling in my car and it fits perfect in that. No leaking or anything!
customer_reviews.author: Haylie

customer_reviews.title: I love this size because I can monitor how much water ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a few smaller Camelbak's, but wanted this larger one to take to work and not have to worry about refilling. I love this size because I can monitor how much water I am drinking. As long as I finish 1 of these bottles a day, I know I will be hydrated! The charcoal color is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: My husband drinks a ton of water everyday and he ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband drinks a ton of water everyday and he used to carry around a 64 oz juicy juicy bottle. I am so thankful I found this bottle. He loves the chuck lid so much more then the traditional camelback lid. He says he cannot get the water out fast enough. Anyways, he loves the bottle, well bottles. He switches them out at lunch time because he drinks that much water.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well constructed, no leaks, comfortable mouthpiece. Color true to product photos. Perfect size to use at work -- gets me through the day without interrupting my workflow for a refill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Airport security snagged my 1L as I left a little water in it. Was pumped to see the 1.5L version. Love it. I love the drinking hole, its shaped well and lets air through for a clean drinking experience.
customer_reviews.author: ShakaBrah

customer_reviews.title: My new fav gym water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle! Love the way the top is made with one handle to hold the bottle with the other to hold the lid on. My new fav gym water bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Life changer here, guys.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best water bottle I've used. My favorite thing about it is the cap. It snaps right into the handle! No more getting poked in the eye by caps! Life changer here guys. Some people have complained about peeling of the lid, but I haven't had any issues - I hand wash it. And not to mention the size is great as well. I fill it up at work and it lasts me a good 4 - 5 hours at my desk until lunch when I fill it up again. I love not having to get up and fill up every hour or so. I plan on buying another to keep one at home and one at work.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Burchick

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle, great price. Good for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this bottle. It is durable, doesn't leak and has been easy to clean. I have traveled with it on and off for about 3 months now, and it has held up great. I hooked a small carabiner onto the back of it so I can hook it onto my bags which has been terrific for easy access and transportation on flights. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant and Hydrated!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bottle because I’m pregnant and was tired of constantly filling up my old one, and it is definitely the best water bottle I have ever purchased! I drink a ton of water regularly anyway, so this will be great to have after baby as well. My husband was even jealous when he saw it (so I may have to get one for him too)!
customer_reviews.author: kissofangel2

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I drink water all day and it lasts a while. I've dropped it completely full several times and for about 4 months now I'm still using it with out it leaking
customer_reviews.author: Andy T.

customer_reviews.title: With so much water, feeling like a camel at my desk.
customer_reviews.text: Fill it about a 1/3 of the way, place it sideways in the freezer overnight, and fill the rest before work. A large supply of water that stays cold for at least six hours that way. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice big bottle!
customer_reviews.text: good bottle, certainly carries a lot of water, but as others say, the cap design is a bit annoying, but if you just hold it out of the way it works fine!
customer_reviews.author: Danny S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle I use way more than the .6 liter insulated. Perfect for working out. Bringing to school. I empty it before I travel home for the day cause it is heavy if you don't drink it all.
customer_reviews.author: mparch

customer_reviews.title: An A for effort.
customer_reviews.text: An A for effort and very good build quality so 5 stars from me. Wished it had some type of handle and a smaller bottom so it can fit into a car's cup holder but other than that this thing is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah M

customer_reviews.title: but overall this is a nice bottle. Holds a large amount of water
customer_reviews.text: The mouthpiece is a little weird, but overall this is a nice bottle. Holds a large amount of water, and is perfect for my desk. I just put a straw in it, and am good.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love our camelback bottles. This is our second bottle due to the first one breaking. I would say these are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Florida Summer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome but this is a big boy. I have both, 1 and 1.5. I life in Fl, part of a tv crew, we need tons of water in summer. This is the one for the job
customer_reviews.author: Rolyphot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability for the money. ($7 sale)
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big water bottle but it’s Holding up really well. My husband is pretty hard on things and even his isn’t showing any wear with daily use! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle that makes your water sparkle
customer_reviews.text: A great water bottle that we use every day. I love the way the blue makes the water look in the bottle. It's easy to clean and is a convenient size. I also like the way the cap can be popped into place to keep the top open.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles. They're perfect. I ordered 2 because I loved it so much
customer_reviews.author: Abigael B.

customer_reviews.title: It's so cheap and convenient, and huge. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so cheap and convenient, and huge. I'm a programmer and I sit all day, and I just sip on this with some MIO instead of coffee
customer_reviews.author: Portland Ben

customer_reviews.title: Wasnt sure at first, but got the product i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I selected 1.5L size and I was worried because the picture showed the 24oz one and the details if I scrolled down said .75L. So I really wasn't sure what I was going to get. But I ended up actually receiving the correct one. Its 48oz(1500ml), basically 50 oz. I believe it's similar form to the smaller, but scaled up in size. The 1L seemed to be a bit wider in comparison to its height. This one looks like a bigger version of the one smaller than 1L. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty easy cleaning indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I have all sizes of this camelback water bottle. They last forever, withstand everything, and clean so easily. Once you start buying them you will order every size.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Better than the camelbak's with the suction or whatever opening
customer_reviews.text: Better than the camelbak's with the suction or whatever opening. Those got dirty very quickly and we ended up reverting to this version.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my giant water bottle! I keep it at work and don't need to fill it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

Spout cap snaps into the handle to prevent it from getting in the way when drinking; tether securely attaches the cap to the bottle for easy filling
The half-turn cap simplifies access to your water, and the spout cap threads internally for comfort
